title: Taking offers Arellanes back run BL,CB, AB, Cycle etc
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: Taking offers Arellanes back run BL,CB, AB, Cycle etc
posts.post_content:
I am taking offers on my back run of Frank Arellanes cards. I have spent many years on this run and many of the cards are high grade when considering tougher backs. The run consists of 9 cards. American Beauty, Broadleaf, Carolina Brights, Cycle, Piedmont, Polar Bear, 2 Sweet Caps amd Tolstoi. It needs Drum and Blank back to be complete. Both are confirmed but have not come up for sale.
 
This is not a fire sale and I would like to see an advanced t206 collector complete it but realize that may not be possible. I will consider breaking it up later but wanted to try this first. Email is the best way for me to communicate. [url]stevenwsadler@aol.com[/url] 
                                         Steve
Here is the Tolstoi. The PB is a 40, the Sweet caps are a 3 and 4.5 and the Piedmont is raw...
Bump, will listen to offers on the CB and Broadleaf. If they go, the others will follow...
The BL and CB have been sold. I'm asking SOLD on the AB and SOLD/BO on the Cycle. Also open to trades for E94s...
Bump with lowered prices on the AB and Cycle, offers welcome...

Bump with one lowered price and one added. Asking 300 on the Tolstoi and SOLD/BO on the Cycle.
                                              Thanks,
                                                Steve
